exceptions.exn: In environment E : Rbar -> Prop l : Rbar H1 : Rbar_is_upper_bound E l H2 : forall b : Rbar, Rbar_is_upper_bound E b -> Rbar_le l b Unable to unify "Lub_Rbar ?M2288 = ?M2289" with "Rbar_lub E = l".
In environment E : Rbar -> Prop l : Rbar H1 : Rbar_is_upper_bound E l H2 : forall b : Rbar, Rbar_is_upper_bound E b -> Rbar_le l b Unable to unify "l" with "Rbar_lub E".
In environment E : Rbar -> Prop l : Rbar H1 : Rbar_is_upper_bound E l H2 : forall b : Rbar, Rbar_is_upper_bound E b -> Rbar_le l b Unable to unify "l" with "Rbar_lub E".

In environment E : Rbar -> Prop l : Rbar H1 : Rbar_is_upper_bound E l H2 : forall b : Rbar, Rbar_is_upper_bound E b -> Rbar_le l b Unable to unify "match l with | Finite x => match ?M2288 with | Finite y => x <= y | p_infty => True | m_infty => False end | p_infty => match ?M2288 with | p_infty => True | _ => False end | m_infty => True end" with "Rbar_lub E = l".
In environment E : Rbar -> Prop l : Rbar H1 : Rbar_is_upper_bound E l H2 : forall b : Rbar, Rbar_is_upper_bound E b -> Rbar_le l b Unable to unify "l" with "Rbar_lub E".

original: intros E l H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply is_lub_Rbar_unique. split. - unfold is_lub_Rbar. split. + intros x [H3 H4]. apply H2. split. * apply H3. * auto. + intros b H5. apply H5. apply H1. - intros b H3. apply H2. split. + apply H1. + auto.
